traits.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, the anarch can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature it can see.

traits.name: Siege Monster
entries: The anarch deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Spiked Club
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2 damage) piercing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2 damage) piercing damage if used with two hands.
